content: for a limited time you can download this pattern for free by visiting the page listed and signing up for the holiday maker s challenge you will also get access to 7 other free downloads but only until december 25 2024 yarn red heart gemstone 1 skein hook us size k 6 5mm notions yarn needle scissors sock stop optional but recommended for walking on slippery areas gauge 13 sts and 8 row = 4″ 10 cm in double_crochet finished size sizes small medium large to fit men s shoe size 6-8 9-11 12-13 foot circumference 8 9 25 10 foot length 9 10 11 sample was made in the medium and my oldest son is a size 10 men s shoe modeling them for me
